name: Legendary Heroes
description: Command ancient champions, mythical creatures, and legendary heroes from history and myth

cards.title: Gilgamesh
cards.description: The legendary king of Uruk, wielding the mighty axe of Enkidu
cards.imageDescription: Ancient Mesopotamian king in ornate armor, wielding a massive double-bladed axe
cards.effect: On summon: +3 damage to all champions this turn; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events
cards.flavor: I am Gilgamesh, King of Uruk, and I will not be denied!

cards.title: Arthur Pendragon
cards.description: The mythical King of Britain, wielder of the legendary sword Excalibur
cards.imageDescription: Noble king in shining armor, holding a glowing sword aloft on a white horse
cards.effect: On summon: Restore 3 HP to all your champions; Passive: +1 card per turn
cards.flavor: For Camelot!

cards.title: Diarmuid Ua Duibhne
cards.description: The legendary Irish hero marked by the love spot, master of dual-wielding
cards.imageDescription: Celtic warrior with dual spears, a distinctive mark on his face, in heroic stance
cards.effect: On summon: draw 2 cards; Passive: When attacking, deal 1 damage to all enemy champions
cards.flavor: The love spot that doomed a king's daughter and made me an outlaw.

cards.title: Alexander the Great
cards.description: The Macedonian conqueror who built the largest empire of the ancient world
cards.imageDescription: Young conqueror in ornate armor on horseback, pointing toward distant lands
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: Champions cost 1 less MP
cards.flavor: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.

cards.title: Hassan-i-Sabbah
cards.description: The Old Man of the Mountain, master of the Hashshashin assassins
cards.imageDescription: Mysterious figure in dark robes, surrounded by shadows and daggers
cards.effect: On summon: opponent discards 3 cards at random; Passive: Skills deal double damage when you have 5 or fewer cards
cards.flavor: Nothing is true, everything is permitted.

cards.title: Divine Intervention
cards.description: Call upon the gods for miraculous aid in battle
cards.imageDescription: Ancient temple with divine light shining down on warriors below
cards.effect: Restore 5 HP to all your champions, draw 2 cards
cards.flavor: The gods smile upon the righteous.

cards.title: Epic Quest
cards.description: Embark on a legendary journey that tests your mettle
cards.imageDescription: Hero setting out on a grand adventure, mountains and challenges ahead
cards.effect: Add 3 random rare cards from your collection to your hand
cards.flavor: Every hero's journey begins with a single step.

cards.title: Ancient Ritual
cards.description: Perform mystical rites to gain supernatural power
cards.imageDescription: Ancient druids performing mysterious ceremony in stone circle
cards.effect: Double the effect of your next card this turn
cards.flavor: The old ways hold power beyond comprehension.

cards.title: Legendary Weapon
cards.description: Wield a weapon of mythic power and renown
cards.imageDescription: Glowing legendary weapon materializing in a hero's hands
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you control a unique champion
cards.flavor: Forged in legend, tempered by time.

cards.title: Heroic Sacrifice
cards.description: Give your life to save others and inspire greatness
cards.imageDescription: Hero making the ultimate sacrifice to protect allies
cards.effect: Deal 4 damage to target champion, you lose 3 HP
cards.flavor: True heroism is measured not by victory, but by sacrifice.

cards.title: Mythical Griffin
cards.description: A majestic creature with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle
cards.imageDescription: Majestic griffin with golden feathers and powerful lion body, soaring through clouds
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 2 damage to all enemy champions; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects under 2
cards.flavor: King of the skies and master of the land.

cards.title: Ancient Dragon
cards.description: A wise and powerful dragon that has lived for centuries
cards.imageDescription: Massive ancient dragon with scales of gold, perched on a mountain peak
cards.effect: On summon: +3 damage to all champions; Passive: Gain 2 MP each turn
cards.flavor: I have seen empires rise and fall, and I shall see many more.

cards.title: Norse Valkyrie
cards.description: A divine chooser of the slain who guides heroes to the afterlife
cards.imageDescription: Winged warrior maiden in armor, carrying a spear and shield, flying through storm clouds
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target, restore 2 HP to all your champions
cards.flavor: I choose who lives, I choose who dies.

cards.title: Achilles
cards.description: The greatest warrior of Greek mythology, nearly invincible except for one fatal weakness
cards.imageDescription: Legendary Greek warrior in bronze armor, wielding a spear with divine aura
cards.effect: On summon: +4 damage to all attacks this turn; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects; When attacking: Deal 3 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: I am the wrath of Achilles, and I shall not be stopped.

cards.title: Odin the All-Father
cards.description: The Norse god of wisdom and war, who sacrificed an eye for ultimate knowledge
cards.imageDescription: Majestic Norse god with long beard and spear, surrounded by ravens and divine lightning
cards.effect: On summon: Draw 3 cards; Passive: +2 card per turn; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: Wisdom comes at a price, and I have paid it in full.

cards.title: King of Kings
cards.description: The ultimate ruler who has conquered kingdoms and united realms under one banner
cards.imageDescription: Majestic monarch in golden armor and crown, standing atop a castle with vast lands below
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: All your champions cost 1 less MP; When attacking: Force opponent to discard 1 card
cards.flavor: One throne, one ruler, one destiny for all.

cards.title: Divine Champion
cards.description: A mortal hero blessed by the gods themselves with divine power and protection
cards.imageDescription: Radiant hero with glowing armor and divine aura, wielding a blessed weapon
cards.effect: On summon: Restore 6 HP to all your champions; Passive: Cannot be targeted by enemy effects; When attacking: Heal 3 HP to player
cards.flavor: The gods have chosen me as their instrument, and their power flows through my veins.

cards.title: Legendary Paladin
cards.description: The ultimate holy warrior who combines divine magic with unmatched combat skills
cards.imageDescription: Noble paladin in shining white armor, surrounded by holy light and sacred symbols
cards.effect: On summon: Prevent all damage to your champions this turn; Passive: When you play a creature, gain 1 MP; When attacking: +2 damage if MP >= 3
cards.flavor: For honor, for justice, for the light that banishes darkness!

cards.title: Mythic Beast
cards.description: A creature of legend so powerful it has become part of the world's mythology
cards.imageDescription: Massive legendary creature with multiple heads and elemental powers, surrounded by ancient ruins
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 5 damage to all enemy champions; Passive: Gain 1 MP at the start of each turn; When attacking: Choose fire, ice, lightning, or earth effect
cards.flavor: I am older than memory, stronger than steel, and eternal as the stars.

cards.title: Heroic Charge
cards.description: Lead a devastating charge that inspires all allies
cards.imageDescription: Hero leading a charge with sword raised, allies following with renewed courage
cards.effect: All your champions gain +3 AP this turn, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: A true leader doesn't just command - they inspire.

cards.title: Legendary Last Stand
cards.description: Make a final, desperate stand that becomes the stuff of legend
cards.imageDescription: Hero making a final stand against overwhelming odds, becoming a beacon of hope
cards.effect: Prevent all damage to your champions this turn, if you survive draw 3 cards
cards.flavor: Some deaths become legends, and legends never truly die.

cards.title: Divine Blessing
cards.description: Receive the favor of the gods to enhance your abilities
cards.imageDescription: Hero being blessed by divine light, gaining supernatural strength and protection
cards.effect: Target champion gains +2 AP and +2 DP this turn, prevent 2 damage
cards.flavor: The gods favor those who favor the innocent.

cards.title: Epic Tale
cards.description: Tell a story so inspiring it grants power to your allies
cards.imageDescription: Bard telling an epic tale to gathered heroes, who listen with wonder and inspiration
cards.effect: All your champions gain +1 AP this turn, draw 2 cards
cards.flavor: A story well told can change the world.

cards.title: Ancient Wisdom
cards.description: Tap into the knowledge of ages to gain insight
cards.imageDescription: Ancient sage meditating, surrounded by scrolls and mystical knowledge
cards.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 2 to draw, shuffle the rest back
cards.flavor: The past holds the keys to the future.

cards.title: Legendary Sword Strike
cards.description: Deliver a blow with a weapon forged in legend
cards.imageDescription: Hero delivering a perfect strike with a glowing legendary sword
cards.effect: Deal 5 damage to target champion, cannot be prevented
cards.flavor: Forged in myth, tempered by time, wielded by destiny.

cards.title: Heroic Resolve
cards.description: Find inner strength to overcome any obstacle
cards.imageDescription: Hero standing strong against overwhelming odds, inner strength glowing
cards.effect: Target champion gains +1 AP and +1 DP this turn
cards.flavor: True heroes are not made by power, but by perseverance.

cards.title: Ancient Shield
cards.description: Use a shield crafted by master artisans of old
cards.imageDescription: Hero raising an ancient shield with intricate designs, deflecting attacks
cards.effect: Prevent 3 damage to target champion this turn
cards.flavor: The old ways made weapons that outlast their makers.

cards.title: Legendary Bow Shot
cards.description: Fire an arrow with perfect accuracy from a legendary bow
cards.imageDescription: Archer drawing back a legendary bow, arrow glowing with perfect aim
cards.effect: Deal 3 damage to target champion from any range
cards.flavor: Distance is no barrier to a true archer's skill.

cards.title: Heroic Leap
cards.description: Leap into battle with superhuman agility
cards.imageDescription: Hero leaping through the air towards enemies, landing with perfect timing
cards.effect: Target champion can attack this turn even if it couldn't before
cards.flavor: A hero knows when to strike and when to soar.

cards.title: Ancient Spell
cards.description: Cast a spell from a forgotten age of magic
cards.imageDescription: Wizard casting an ancient spell with glowing runes and mystical energy
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion, restore 2 HP to target champion
cards.flavor: The old magic still holds power for those who know how to wield it.

cards.title: Legendary Armor
cards.description: Don armor forged by legendary smiths
cards.imageDescription: Hero donning gleaming legendary armor, becoming nearly invulnerable
cards.effect: Target champion gains +2 DP this turn, prevent 1 damage
cards.flavor: True protection comes not from the armor, but from the will to protect.

cards.title: Heroic Rally
cards.description: Inspire allies to fight with renewed vigor
cards.imageDescription: Hero rallying allies with inspiring words and gestures, boosting morale
cards.effect: All your champions gain +1 AP this turn
cards.flavor: A single voice can unite many hearts.

cards.title: Ancient Tome
cards.description: Study a tome of forgotten knowledge
cards.imageDescription: Scholar reading from an ancient tome, gaining mystical knowledge
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards, gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: Knowledge is the greatest treasure of all.

cards.title: Legendary Helm
cards.description: Wear a helm that grants clarity and focus
cards.imageDescription: Hero donning a legendary helm with intricate designs, gaining mental clarity
cards.effect: Target champion can attack again this turn, gain 1 fatigue
cards.flavor: A clear mind sees the path to victory.

cards.title: Heroic Endurance
cards.description: Push through pain and exhaustion with sheer willpower
cards.imageDescription: Hero continuing to fight despite injuries, driven by inner strength
cards.effect: Target champion gains resistance to damage under 2 this turn
cards.flavor: True heroes are forged in the crucible of adversity.

cards.title: Loyal Squire
cards.description: A devoted young warrior ready to serve and learn
cards.imageDescription: Young squire in training armor, ready to assist their knight master
cards.effect: Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn; When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target
cards.flavor: Every great knight started as someone's squire.

cards.title: Ancient Spirit
cards.description: A mystical being that has watched over the world for ages
cards.imageDescription: Ethereal spirit with ancient wisdom, floating near historical landmarks
cards.effect: Passive: When you play a unique card, draw 1 card; When attacking: Restore 1 HP to target champion
cards.flavor: I have seen civilizations rise and fall, and I remember them all.
